description:
The singletail whip is not just a means for administering pain and punishment; it can also be a very sensuous tool for delivering soft and subtle impact play, from a puff of air to a light caress, all the way up to orgasm-inducing liquid fire. World-renown whipmaster Guy shares the basics of East Cpast Swing style singletailing and the secrets of how even novice whip handlers can create exotic scenes that build erotic tension with a wide variety of sensations, from a puff of air to molten bars of fire. Learn how to safely and easily control one whip or even two at once, with better stamina and accuracy, using a distinctly fluid and sensual style.
Bonus: This workshop includes a photoset with step-by-step captions.
title: Singletailing 101 (East Coast Swing)
